Za strokovnega direktorja izolske bolnišnice en kandidat
07 Nov 2019, 15:26 by STA

Splošna bolnišnica Izola (SBI) je v postopku razpisa za strokovnega direktorja zavoda, ki ga je objavila 4. oktobra, prejela prijavo enega kandidata. Končno besedo bo sicer imel svet zavoda, ki bo o imenovanju strokovnega direktorja odločal predvidoma pred koncem letošnjega leta, so za STA pojasnili v SBI.



Splošna bolnišnica Izola (SBI) je v postopku razpisa za strokovnega direktorja zavoda, ki ga je objavila 4. oktobra, prejela prijavo enega kandidata. Foto: Zdravko Primožič/FPA

IZOLA > Strokovnega direktorja namreč imenuje svet zavoda na predlog direktorja bolnišnice in po predhodnem mnenju strokovnega sveta, so še navedli v bolnišnici.
Skladno z razpisom so se lahko za strokovnega direktorja prijavili kandidati z univerzitetno izobrazbo medicinske smeri, opravljeno specializacijo s področja dejavnosti zavoda in najmanj petimi leti delovnih izkušenj na delovnem mestu zdravnika specialista.
Poleg znanja slovenskega jezika je od kandidata pričakovano tudi znanje italijanščine in enega izmed svetovnih jezikov.
Pogodbo o zaposlitvi bodo z izbranim kandidatom oz. kandidatko sklenili za določen čas štirih let. Strokovni direktor bo v času sanacije bolnišnice Izola tudi član sanacijske uprave.
Funkcijo strokovnega direktorja SBI kot vršilec dolžnosti trenutno opravlja Dušan Deisinger.

One candidate for the director of the hospital in Izola
07 Nov 2019, 15:26 by STA

The Izola General Hospital (SBI) received an application from one candidate in the tender process for the institute's expert director, which it published on 4 October. The final word will be given to the council of the institute, which is expected to decide on the appointment of an expert director before the end of this year, the SBI explained.



The Izola General Hospital (SBI) received an application from one candidate in the tender process for the institute's expert director, which it published on 4 October. Photo: Zdravko Primozic / FPA

IZOLA> The expert director is appointed by the council of the institute upon the proposal of the director of the hospital, and according to the preliminary opinion of the expert council, the hospital was also stated.
Candidates with a university degree in medical science, completed specialization in the field of activities of the institute and at least five years of professional experience in the post of specialist doctor were allowed to apply for the expert director, according to the call.
In addition to knowledge of the Slovenian language, the candidate is also expected to have knowledge of Italian and one of the world's languages.
The employment contract will be with the selected candidate or. the candidate was contracted for a fixed term of four years. The expert director will also be a member of the rehabilitation board during the rehabilitation of Izola Hospital.
The role of SBI expert director as acting director is currently being performed by Dusan Deisinger.
